paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for BRCA2, including penetrance data and individual records.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: Germline testing revealed a pathogenic BRCA2 germline alteration.

functional_data.summary: The alteration leads to a frameshift mutation.

variants.additional_notes: This variant is associated with a high risk of breast cancer.
key_quotes: Germline testing revealed a pathogenic BRCA2 germline alteration.

patients.phenotype: BRCA2-driven breast cancer with resistance to PARP inhibitors

individual_records.phenotype_details: developed resistance to PARP inhibitor olaparib
individual_records.evidence_sentence: This somatic alteration (p.N255fs, c.764_770del) in combination with the germline frameshift resulted in an in-frame indel and subsequent restoration of the BRCA2 reading frame.

functional_data.summary: The alteration restores the open reading frame, likely accounting for resistance to PARP inhibition.

variants.additional_notes: This variant is associated with acquired resistance to treatment.
key_quotes: This somatic alteration (p.N255fs, c.764_770del) in combination with the germline frameshift resulted in an in-frame indel and subsequent restoration of the BRCA2 reading frame.

patients.phenotype: BRCA2-driven breast cancer with resistance to PARP inhibitors

individual_records.phenotype_details: developed resistance to PARP inhibitor olaparib
individual_records.evidence_sentence: The genomic analysis identified the known somatic and germline BRCA2 alterations (1% and 53.4% VAF, respectively), as well as an additional unique somatic BRCA2 alteration (p.D252fs, c.755_758del) at 0.9% VAF.

functional_data.summary: The alteration restores the open reading frame, likely accounting for resistance to PARP inhibition.

variants.additional_notes: This variant is associated with acquired resistance to treatment.
key_quotes: The genomic analysis identified the known somatic and germline BRCA2 alterations (1% and 53.4% VAF, respectively), as well as an additional unique somatic BRCA2 alteration (p.D252fs, c.755_758del) at 0.9% VAF.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant BRCA2 variants were extracted successfully.
